channel.title: Defaults on Miles-Bell family history
channel.description: Recent content in Defaults on Miles-Bell family history

item.title: Bell - Smith
item.description: Frederick Bell Elsie Maud Smith Frederick and Elsie Maud were married in 1903, in Kensington, England. The FreeBMD GRO reference is: “Jun 1903, Bell Frederick, Kensington 1a 327” The family emigrated from England to New Zealand sometime between 1904 and 1909. Text from https://www.myheritage.com/names/elsie_miles has: Frederick was born on November 17 1875, in Alnwick, Northumberland, United Kingdom. Elsie was born in March 1875, in Kensington, London, England.

item.title: Catherine Harriet Dunn
item.description: Born in 1867 to James Dunn and Mary Copley NZ birth record 1867/12452 Dunn Catherine Hariet Mother: Mary Father: James Married Edgar John Miles

item.title: Dunn - Copley
item.description: See Ancestry.com on Florence Moor From data there, marriage is probably: 1865/4781 Mary Copley James Dunne This is from the NZ records site; there are only 3 marriages to bride name Copley from 1850-1880, only one to Mary Copley. NZ birth records for children: Reg. No Family Name Given Name(s) Mother’s Given Name(s) Father’s Given Name(s) 1864/17490 Dunn Mary Mary James 1867/12452 Dunn Catherine Hariet Mary James 1869/15081 Dunn Mary Elizabeth Mary James 1872/14570 Dunn Margaret Annie Mary James 1875/8095 Dunn Georgina Mary James 1876/14651 Dunn Florence Charlotte Mary James 1877/12924 Dunn James Mary James 1878/9451 Dunn William John Mary James 1880/3310 Dunn Joseph Mary James 1881/18222 Dunn Amelia May Mary James 1883/3065 Dunn James William Capley Mary James 1884/19733 Dunn William Mary James 1887/18829 Dunn Eileen Ethel Mary James Mary Elizabeth married someone called John William Dickins: NZ 1894/2834

item.title: Edgar John Miles
item.description: There is no NZ birth record for “Edgar John Miles”. Only one UK birth record for “Edgar John Miles”, Start date: Mar 1860; End date: Dec 1890: 1872 - MILES Edgar John Warminster 5a 157 Copy of possible birth certificate

item.title: Edgar Owen Miles
item.description: See https://www.geni.com/people/Edgar-Miles/6000000024713403955. NZ records show Edgar was born in 1905 to Edgar John Miles and Catherine Harriet Dunn The Ancestry.com page on Elsie Miles says: Edgar was born on August 16 1905. NZ birth record: 1905/1909 Miles Edgar Owen Catherine Harriet Edgar John Edgar Owen was appointed as a sanitary inspector in April 1940: He avoided military service as a result - see this edition of the Auckland Star June 15, and specifically this page:

item.title: Elsie Embleton Bell
item.description: Elsie born in New Zealand in 1910 - New Zealand certificate ref 1910/3695, to parents Frederick Bell and Elsie Maud Smith. See Miles-Bell for Elsie’s own marriage and family. Elsie died in New Zealand, in 1984, of ovarian cancer.

item.title: Miles - Bell
item.description: About the family of Elsie Miles and Owen Edgar Miles. Edgar Owen Miles Elsie Embleton Bell NZ marriage record 1932/1971 Elsie Embleton Bell Edgar Owen Miles See Geni family tree, probably by Chris Miles. Children: Maurice Miles Barbara Miles Denys James Miles NZ death record: 1988/53199 Miles Denys James DoB: 26 October 1939 Bruce Miles John Miles Neville Miles

item.title: Miles - Dunn
item.description: About the family of Edgar John Miles and Catherine Harriet Dunn. Edgar John Miles Catherine Harriet Dunn NZ marriage record: 1905/4735 Catherine Harriett Dunn Edgar John Miles Both parents went before a jury as plaintiffs for compensation for injuries before NZ supreme court. Also listed in https://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/imageserver-newspapers/AS19050811.pdf More detail in : The Loverty Bay Herald, Gisborne, Dec 12 1905 - XXXII No 10,537 Last night’s New Zealand News (Per Press Association) Auckland, last night:
